title: MG Windsor EV prices revealed: Check variants and features of 'intelligent' CUV
description: MG Windsor: JSW MG Motor India has announced the prices for its new MG Windsor, India's first intelligent crossover utility vehicle. Starting at Rs 13,49,800 (Ex-Showroom), the Windsor comes in three variants and includes a lifetime battery warranty. The car features advanced safety, seamless connectivity, and a range of high-tech innovations.
